title: Looking for signed pre-war hof cards

posts.post_title: Looking for signed pre-war hof cards
posts.post_content: Looking to increase my signed pre-war hof autographed cards, anyone have any dupes or willing to part or trade?
Bump - Anyone signed pre-war hof cards?  Goudey, T206, Play Ball, Diamond Stars...etc
